BBEX3.A.TMM.EUR.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the euro in Turkmenistan / EUR 1 = TMM ... (middle)
General: Currency conversion with effect from 1 January 2009 at the rate of TMM 5,000 = TMT 1; for exchange rates as of 2009, see BBEX3:A:TMT:EUR:CA:AC:A04.
Source: Central Bank of Turkmenistan, Ashgabat.
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of mid-month and month-end rates, until 2000 on the basis of month-end rates.

Comment on 2008: On 1 January 2008, the fixed exchange rate with the US dollar was changed from USD 1 = TMM 5,200 to USD 1 = TMM 6,250; calculated devaluation: 16.8%.  On 1 May 2008, the fixed exchange rate with the US dollar was changed from USD 1 = TMM 6,250 to USD 1 = TMM 14,250; calculated devaluation: 56,1%.  Currency conversion with effect from 1 January 2009 at the rate of TMM 5,000 = TMT 1.
